mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY AS LABEL, COUNT(ITEM_ID) AS QUANTITY FROM ITEMS GROUP BY CATEGORY
SELECT TAG AS LABEL, COUNT(ITEM_ID) AS QUANTITY FROM ITEM_TAGS GROUP BY TAG
SELECT CATEGORY FROM ITEMS GROUP BY CATEGORY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMS(ITEM_ID, LABEL, "DESC", PRICE, STOCK, CATEGORY) VALUES (#{item_id}, #{label}, #{desc}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I."DESC", I.CATEGORY, I.PRICE, I.STOCK, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS I ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEMS SET CATEGORY = #{category}, LABEL = #{label}, "DESC" = #{desc}, PRICE = #{price}, STOCK = #{stock} WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
INSERT INTO ITEM_IMAGES(ITEM_ID, PATH, CATEGORY) VALUES (#{item_id}, #{image_id}, 'detail')
